**Objective:** Seeking quantitative and analytics focused positions in health-related research fields, specifically focused on health services research, health disparities, and health outcomes.

**Summary:** I'm a 5th year PhD student and certified speech-language pathologist. To date, my research has focused on improving the effectiveness of aphasia rehabilitation services from two perspectives: (1) specifying the active ingredients of aphasia treatments and (2) accelerating the clinical implementation of research in clinical practice settings. To achieve these goals, I have pursued training in psycholinguistic treatment theory, quantitative methods and statistical programming, health services research, and implementation science.
